name: Salmon Swipe
description:
Salmon Swipe is a game created by two members of VGDDC at ODU.

A "clicker style" game where you swipe your bear paw into the water in order to claw out some salmon. These salmon is the main source of trade in these woods. Fish for a minute or so and the local Bear Shop will travel down the river. Click on the boat when it stops in order to dock it! When the boat is docked you can buy upgrades!!

Swipe for salmon.

Use salmon to buy upgrades.

Repeat!!

Things happen after a few upgrades, so pay attention as you play!
